entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
